FeatureFlags.Name: LastAccessedView
FeatureFlags.Description: Store the last Case/OET accessed view by the user. Case List filters is dependent on this flag as well as QAReworkFlag

FeatureFlags.Name: PDFViewerEnhancement
FeatureFlags.Description: Show old or new PDFViewer. True is new

FeatureFlags.Name: LicenseDateTimeConversionFix
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to fix date time issue on dates

FeatureFlags.Name: SubmissionSummary
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to check PNREF while adding Payment record

FeatureFlags.Name: PreventConvertToExceptionCase
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to prevent converting a Standard case to Exception Case

FeatureFlags.Name: PreventAddExceptionCase
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to prevent creation of new Exception Case

FeatureFlags.Name: ApplicantLoginPollingInterval
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to set polling interval on applicant login

FeatureFlags.Name: ENABLE_APOLLO_BATCH_AUTHORITY
FeatureFlags.Description: true to batchhttplink, false for httplink

FeatureFlags.Name: APOLLO_BATCH_MAX_AUTHORITY
FeatureFlags.Description: Max batch size allowed for apollo calls for Verify Clinical Skills Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: APOLLO_BATCH_INTERVAL_AUTHORITY
FeatureFlags.Description: Interval for batched apollo requests for Verify Clinical Skills Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: REVALIDATION_ENABLED
FeatureFlags.Description: Flag to enable Revalidation feature

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_SYSTEM_AUTHORITY
FeatureFlags.Description: Message to be displayed during the maintenance on Authority Portal
FeatureFlags.Value:
Pathways for ECFMG Certification Clinical Skills Evaluation and Attestation Portal Unavailable ##timeRangeStr##.

Due to scheduled maintenance, the Pathways for ECFMG Certification Clinical Skills Evaluation and Attestation Portal is expected to be unavailable beginning at approximately ##startTimestampStr##. The application is expected to be restored by ##endTimestampStr##. All times are calculated using Eastern Time in the United States. Thank you for your patience and cooperation as we work to maintain high-quality on-line services.

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_IMPENDING_AUTHORITY
FeatureFlags.Description: Message to be displayed when the maintenance is impending on Authority Portal
FeatureFlags.Value: Pathways for ECFMG Certification Clinical Skills Evaluation and Attestation Portal Unavailable ##timeRangeStr##. Due to scheduled maintenance, the Pathways for ECFMG Certification Clinical Skills Evaluation and Attestation Portal is expected to be unavailable beginning at approximately ##startTimestampStr##. The application is expected to be restored by ##endTimestampStr##. All times are calculated using Eastern Time in the United States. Thank you for your patience and cooperation as we work to maintain high-quality on-line services.

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_IMPENDING_TIMESTAMP_AUTHORITY
FeatureFlags.Description: DateTime in UTC when the impending message should begin to be displayed on Authority Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_START_TIMESTAMP_AUTHORITY
FeatureFlags.Description: DateTime in UTC when the maintenance is going to begin on Authority Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_MSG_END_TIMESTAMP_AUTHORITY
FeatureFlags.Description: DateTime in UTC when the maintenance is going to end on Authority Portal

FeatureFlags.Name: MAINTENANCE_UPCOMING_AUTHORITY
FeatureFlags.Description: Maintenance is scheduled and message is set
